title: For Sale:  WW1 Steyr-Hahn 9mm Austrian cavalry pistol
postcontent:
Up for sale is a cherry M1912 Steyr-Hahn pistol. Everybody's got a 1911, but who out there has a 1912?

This is a pretty rare pistol in very good shape for its age- the finish is faded, but there's none of the rust, pits, bad rebluing job, or other defects that most examples have. Also, it's not a commercial Chilean contract piece, but an actual Austrian issued WW1 example, completely matching numbers, and otherwise about as good an example as you'll find on the open market.

If you're not familiar with the design, this pistol uses a twisting barrel with three big lugs on it, and feeds from an internal magazine- you reload it from the top with stripper clips. Any old 9mm or 7.62x25 Tokarev clip should work, or even a modified .223 stripper clip. The idea was it's less parts to get lost and less chance of dirt entering the mechanism.  

Caliber is 9x23mm Steyr. If you can find one, there are drop-in WW2 production barrels that allow you to fire 9mm Luger, but this pistol is unconverted.

Included is one fifty-round box of collectable/shootable noncorrosive 9mm Steyr commercial FMJ ammo.

Asking $650 or best offer. Full or partial trades considered.

H&K LEM in .45, of course has the enhanced LE trigger grouping. Has Trijicon tritium night sights, and can come with extra mags, quick release holster, and light. Price DOES NOT include extras! Slide wear, but performs perfectly, has been one of my 2 favorite guns, which are both for sale as I have a house closing in 35 days and need the cash. 
Please, no lowballing, I know the gun is worth more than I am asking, as the LEM are very rare. The value on this gun is $950 in the condition it is in (look it up)
Please call, text or email me and I will respond with a friendly reply. I will not show the gun unless you have cash in hand, have a valid driver's license, and can legally own a gun. 
I have bill of sale written up and ready.
REDACTED
Info on the LEM Model:
Developed especially for the U.S. government, the Law Enforcement Modification (or LEM for short), is a USP DAO (Double-Action Only) model with a unique trigger mechanism. This mechanism improves the double action trigger performance and reduces the weight of the DAO trigger pull to 7.58.5 pounds-force (3338 N), uses a stronger hammer spring, and shortens the trigger reset. Aside from the LEM mechanism, it is identical to the USP Variant 7 (DAO) model.

title: For Sale/Trade:  S&W 29-2 .44mag N. Carolina highway patrol
postcontent: This is a 29-2 by Smith and Wesson (The Dirty Harry gun). Its a commemorative N. Carolina Highway Patrol 50 year anniversary. Its never been fired and is a beautiful gun. Only 1200 were made. The story behind this gun is an officer lost his life in the line of duty and the gun was given to his daughter in his honor. She moved to California and was intimidated by the laws and had a friend hold it for her since 1979. The gun sat in his safe until about 6 months ago, when he was finally able to sell it with her blessing. You will not find the value of this gun easily. I finally found it in the Smith and Wesson Standard catalog of prices. In 2007, it was worth 12-1500. IN 2012 s&w verbally told me via a phone call i made to them that it is in the area of 15-1800 currently. I posted a pic of the price from the catalog.

location: Surfside Beach, Myrtle Beach, South Carolina
postcontent:
Nearly new condition Saiga 12 semi-auto shotgun 12 gauge.  Includes telescopic Tapco butt stock with pistol grip, and original butt in original box.  Also with one 5 round mag and one 10 round mag and instruction manual.

Very few marks other than operating marks where the safety is, and light scratches.  Looks pretty much the same as the day I bought it.  Fired less than 50 rounds through it.   

The Saiga-12 self-loading smooth bored shotgun is intended for professional and sport hunting of small-and medium-size game under any climatic conditions.

This shotgun is built on the famous AK-47 action that has been proven by years of very reliable combat action!

The shotgun comes with 12-ga. smooth bored barrel and the chamber which accepts the ammo equipped with shot or slugs including "Magnum" cartridges with 70mm (2-3/4") and 76 mm (3") cartridge case.

The shotgun is used to deliver single shots. It is reloaded automatically due to the energy of powder combustion gases bled from the barrel bore through the barrel port. The shotgun may be equipped with a sight leaf adjustable for windage and elevation, which makes zeroing and firing at moving targets more convenient. The gas motive unit is adjustable to match the parameters of internal ballistics inherent to the standard cartridges and "Magnum" cartridges, as well. For the purpose of diversifying operational capabilities the shotgun may be equipped with muzzle adapters of different chokes.

title: For Sale:  Taser International Pink C2 Gold Package
postcontent:
Taser C2 Pink W/Laser Package Deal! 

The technologically advanced TASER C2 is designed for your personal safety needs. Utilizing the same technology as our proven law enforcement models, it offers incredible take down power and unparalleled protection right in the palm of your hand.

TASER C2 is an Electronic Control Device (ECD) that delivers an incapacitating pulse that overrides the sensory and motor functions of the nervous system. This powerful Neuro Muscular Incapacitation (NMI) technology can stop even the most aggressive individuals, including those under the influence of drugs and/or alcohol.

The C2 uses a replaceable cartridge containing inert, compressed nitrogen to fire two small probes that are attached to 15 foot (4.5 meter) insulated conductive wires. Energy is sent over the wires into the probes, which can penetrate up to two cumulative inches of clothing. The charge is transmitted between the two probes, jamming sensory and motor functions, and inhibiting muscular control. This NMI effect continues in 30-second cycles each time you press the trigger. The C2 can also be used as a direct contact stun device.

Advanced Features

15 ft. (4.5 m) range allows you to stop an attacker before s/he gets to you

30 second electrical pulse allows you time to safely escape danger or keep an attacker down

Bold laser sighting system helps you aim confidently and accurately

Integrated LED light illuminates dark places to improve your line of vision

Compact, lightweight design allows it to be easily and discreetly carried everywhere you go

Long-lasting Lithium Power Magazine allows over 50 uses, ensuring you have power when you need it most



Effectiveness

TASER ECDs are the ONLY devices that can consistently incapacitate aggressive, dangerous people. They bring incredible stopping power that has been field-tested by thousands of law enforcement officers around the world. They are safer and more effective than other options, such as sprays or direct contact stuns, that require potentially dangerous chemicals or close range to an attacker and often prove to be ineffective on individuals under the influence of drugs and/or alcohol. TASER ECDs allow you to take control of your personal safety.



Easy To Use

Unlike other self-defense options, a TASER C2 can be used and is effective on any area of the body. This is critically important if youre in a highly stressful, dangerous situation that requires you to quickly to defend yourself and/or your loved ones. Its as easy as point and shoot.



Legal To Carry In Most States

TASER devices are not considered firearms by the U.S. Government. They can be legally carried (concealed or open) without permit in 43 states. Use of TASER ECDs is prohibited in DC, HI, MA, MI, NJ, NY, RI, WI and certain other cities and counties. Check local laws before purchasing or carrying ECDs.



Lifetime Replacement Guarantee

Your life is worth more than the cost of a TASER C2!



We at TASER International are 100% committed to protecting life your life. That is why we will replace your TASER C2 free of charge should you ever need to use it to defend yourself. In that event, leave your C2 behind, get to a safe place, and contact police for help. If your C2 is not recovered or is damaged, send a copy of the police report to us, and well send you a new one.



Protecting your LIFE is our PRIORITY.



*Applies only to incidents that occur in the United States.



STATES WHERE STUN GUNS ARE RESTRICTED:



DELAWARE ILLINOIS

HAWAII 

MASSACHUSETTS 

MICHIGAN 

NEW JERSEY 

NEW YORK 

RHODE ISLAND 

WISCONSIN





Package includes:

1 Training Cartridge

2 Taser C2 Cartridges

title: For Sale:  1981 Winchester 94 John Wayne "DUKE" .32-.40 NIB
postcontent:
Collectors: This is that RARE find that you've been searching and waiting for. Get it before its gone. This is the 1981 Winchester Model 94 John Wayne "DUKE". There were only 1000 of these ever made. This awesome Lever action rife comes in a presentation dark walnut presentation box.-(couple of small scratches from 31 years off storage) The case has three clasps (one locking- no keys) on the front. It has bright red felt covering the inside of the case, it really shows the rifle off well.-(some rub marks were the rifle sits) The case is custom fit just for this rifle. The rifle from stock to front site is Gorgeous. The stock is some of the most beautifully figured and checkered walnut I've ever seen. The stock also has a flat top. The stock has a antique gold plated medallion inlayed in it, with John Wayne himself and his name molded in. The antique 24k Gold Plated receiver is deeply engraved with names from all of his western movies. On the right side it has a scene of John Wayne on horseback driving cattle. The movie names on the right side are El Dorado, The Cowboys, The Undefeated, Red River, Rio Lobo, Chisum, Rio Bravo, True Grit, War Wagon, Sons of Katie Elder, McLintock, and How The West Was Won.-(Case has warn down two spots next to the magazine load entry. See pics) The Left side of the receiver has a scene of a stage coach with cowboys shooting at the Indians. The movies on the left side are Rio Grande, Hondo, Stagecoach, The Searchers, Fort Apache, She Wore A Yellow Ribbon, The Comancheros, and The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance. On the receiver behind the hammer, John Wayne's signature is engraved. The large loop lever (to accommodate cowboy gloves) has some engraving on it.-(small pitting spots where the tag string was wrapped around it and very small box wear spot on top of receiver. See pics) The bottom side of the receiver has the Serial Number "DUKE 611" The barrel has two barrel bands on it, both 24k antique gold. On the right side of the blued barrel the words "DUKE-ONE OF ONE THOUSAND" are engraved in gold. The left side of the barrel has the words "WINCHESTER MODEL 94 32-40 WIN. MADE IN NEW HAVEN CONN. U.S.A. WINCHESTER PROOF STEEL" engraved. In case is original John Wayne pictured hang tag. The rifle is in amazing Unfired condition with very little signs of its 31 year old life in a box. Don't miss this rare chance to own the best John Wayne Commemorative gun ever produced. Email with any questions or if you want more pics. I have detailed pics of every inch of the Rifle and Box. Additional inclusions, pictured: "WINCHESTER JOHN WAYNE COMMEMORATIVE MODEL 94 CARBINE AND 32-40 WINCHESTER AMMUNITION" POSTER, suitable for framing, which was ordered separately when purchasing the Firearm in 1981; "Instructions for your Winchester Model 94 John Wayne Commemorative Lever Action Carbine."; Winchester "FIREARMS PURCHASE RECORD CARD" which is completely blank; "Winchester Authorized Service Centers" pamphlet; and Winchester Warranty paper. 
Please do not hesitate to contact me for further info and/or pictures.
Contact Larry at REDACTED

title: For Sale/Trade:  VZ2008 7.62x39 (NOT an ak47)
postcontent: This is a VZ2008, which is a Century made VZ58. Rifle is in GREAT condition with US made receiver and barrel. This is NOT an ak47 type rifle. These rifles are far superior than the ak47 rifle due to their low weight (about 6lbs unloaded), bolt carrier design (top completely opens up, sort of like an SKS), and short stroke piston design. They do NOT accept ak47 mags, being that the VZ has an integrated bolt hold open design. These rifles have become somewhat rare now (both the VZ2008 and its parent rifle, the VZ58) so I am FIRM on my price. Please text (no calls) me at REDACTED. Selling/trading to Alabama residents ONLY. Thank you.

title: For Sale:  Antique WW1 French Berthier Carbine with bayonet!
postcontent:
Up for sale is an awesome piece of WW1 history- a Mannlicher-Berthier 07/15 carbine. This was the mainstay battle rifle of the French Army in WW1, since the Lebel rifle was in too short a supply. 

And before you start stupid jokes about only dropped once, this rifle is a depot rebuild, made from at least three separate rifles. Chances are that the guys carrying the originals met with a grisly fate attacking MG nests or holding trenches while being shelled. 

Overall the rifle's probably in 70% shape- it's got uniform old pitting turned to patination, a surprisingly decent bore, and is 100% functional.

Comes with a standard Berthier carbine bayonet.

Asking $275, best offer, or trade. Great conversationpiece, collectable, and still serviceable t over 95 years old.

title: For Sale:  SOLD   Belgium Made 12 ga. Hammer Gun
location: North Central Indiana, Indiana, United States
postcontent: SOLD    This is an old Belgium made 12 ga. hammer gun with fluid steel barrels. It is quite shootable. Choked as a bird gun. title: For Sale:  91/30 Mosin Nagants - Hex - EX SNIPER
location: raleigh, Raleigh / Durham / CH, North Carolina
postcontent:
Hey folks, I will find the 91/30s YOU want. I have sold out of the 15+ 91/30s I had in just 4 days! However I still have a limited supply to be "picked" from.

I am taking REQUESTS for what you want/need. Below is what I can find and the prices.
All rifles I sell WILL be matching,very good or better bore,excellent stocks and come with cleaning rod.

Hex Receiver (1920s-1930s) Tula $150-160. Izhevsk $155
Ex Snipers(Generally 1943-1944) Izhevsk $165
Plain Round receivers. Izhevsk Only(1939-1943) $125
MO Marked(Defense Ministry) Izhevsk only. $145

I get my rifles from the importer so they have NOT been shot since in Soviet hands. 
What I do.. I sort through many rifles looking for rare snipers,MO,matching numbers and for great bores. I generally spend a couple hours doing this looking through 30-40 rifles and ONLY choose the best.

So if you are looking for something specific and agree to my prices(which are firm) send me an email and I will find it for you!

Right now what I know is available
1933 Izhevsk Hex Receiver
1935 Tula Hex Receiver
1935 Tula hex Receiver
1943 Izhevsk Ex Sniper
1943 Izhevsk ex sniper.
MANY 1942 and 43 Izhevsk rifles.

MO Marked Rifles: A rifle used by the Soviet Security Forces during and after WW2 to guard soviet ministry buildings.
Ex Sniper:At the end of the war the soviets had over 200,000 sniper rifles and could not afford to keep them clean and uptodate. They removed the scope,mount and welded over the mount holes creating what collectors refer to as a "ex sniper".

REDACTED
Feel free to text me, I figure theres around 7-8 great rifles left to be picked up.
